title: League of noobs. fuck i hate it
body:
Champion for league of noobs (OP and requiring bronze level skill only plus ridiculous snowballing)

-akali (ridiculous dmg, chasing power and stealth and most fuked up lifesteal ever)
-katarina (just fking too simple. spam ur keyboard and penta :D )
-garen (once he owns the lane u cannot do a shit as fighter champ. very easy to counter as tanky champ eg. reneck, singed. but can cause nightmare for riven beginners)
-xin xiao (hate him cuz he loves dog meat and shark's pin and im animal lover. despite of saying dat, i'm pretty sure hes fast at delivering chinese food as i remember seeing his face a couple of time in the past)
-rengar ( ult. turn on YM blade. jump EQWQQWEWQEQWEQQEQWEWQEQWEQWEW)


*Champions for league of gosu (Strong but requiring decent level of skill at the same. they can be rubbish or op champ depends on player's gosuness)

-zed (faker senpai)
-yasuo (dade senpai)
-riven (since how fast player can cancel AA and Q animation makes lots of difference in  her early dmg output and requires delicate skill combo to make her shine during teamfight) 
-le blanc (well again, faker senpai)
-udyr ( requires very good understanding of jungling, counter ganking and objective controlling to make sure him and his teammates to survive ealry game.  the player has to be the most effective and efficient jgler at the same time to be called as godyr)
-vayne (because she is for gods of ADC)
-lee sin (do u know insec, dandy, clearlove or ever tried to have Nathanielbee lee sin compilation on youtube ?)

hate those league of noob diggers with their nickname based on name of pokemon . Yes mewtwo is also OP pokemon

replies.body: Wtf is this post even supposed to be about?
about '%%%% you noob players loving noob champs with cheap play style '
zed is for gosu. i said. not for noobs. gw for being dumb and not reading full article before comment
I didn't read the full article because all you're doing is arguing like a little %%%%%.

This is so embarrassing to read
I was cringing the whole way through.

> but can cause nightmare for riven beginners

m8

>Champion for league of noobs (OP and requiring bronze level skill only plus ridiculous snowballing)

Stopped reading after this line. Are you kidding me?

Play something like Dota 2 then come back to tell me how snowbally LoL is. 

If anything LoL NEEDS to be more snowbally otherwise the death of all early game champs is simply a matter of time as Riot is constantly shifting more power into late game.

EDIT: And your "Strong but requiring decent level of skill at the same time" list is a joke, since everyone in the list is/was hilariously broken in one way or another, are you trolling?
well ur tier and KDA dont give u any right to tell me dat im trolling. ROFL !!

K. Do you need to be a film maker or some kind of a journalist to judge a quality of a film or a review of it?

You simply lose all credibility when you list Garen as one of your Broken Champ example. He counters Riven's early by design that's what we call counter picking. Cut him some slack, that's his ONLY use in the entire game atm.

All of the other "broken champs", I can only see Rengar sitting prob the closest to being actually broken in some aspects, maybe include Akali as she is too bipolar, the rest I say No, if we were to consider the entire community as a whole.

Also, if anything your "broken champs" are actually more balanced then the ones you think are "balanced", except Riven she cool and Maybe Zed atm.

unfortunately. garen cannot counter riven if riven player has some experience. and i didnt list garen as broken because he can be deadly to certain champs whose player is not gosu with them as i stated there.
